Complete daily Moodle tasks quickly as a Teacher.
- Check all assessments with one click
- See all assessments requiring marking in a functional table
- Check all student attendances in one click

*Currently tested on TAFE NSW Moodles [https://moodle2.wit.tafensw.edu.au]
